thread.section_title: Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One of my favorites
thread.title_full: One of my favorites - Review of Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jonathan E
title: One of my favorites
text: Sofitel is always a good bet and in Paris you can't go wrong with this property. Wonderfully appointed and clean/quiet. The location is very quiet due to restricted access on the street given the US embassy next door. Close to the metro and the best haute shopping street in Paris. Love it and great for families too. Not cheap but well worth it.
